# **Lab Manual**

### *Answering Questions with data: Lab Manual*

Every week you will participate in a statistics lab. Here you will learn how to use R and R-studio to solve problems in statistics. You will be following the exercises in this lab manual.

Every week you will participate in a statistics lab. Here you will learn how to use R and R-studio to solve problems in statistics. You will be following the exercises in this lab manual.

[SPEA-E538 Lab Manual](https://malloryb.github.io/statisticsLab_E538/).

The web address is [https://malloryb.github.io/statisticsLab_E538/](https://malloryb.github.io/statisticsLab_E538/).

The lab manual is on the web, so you can look at what you are going to do each week any time you want!

This is again, based on the lab manual for undergraduates by Matthew Crump, which can be found at [https://crumplab.github.io/statisticsLab/](https://crumplab.github.io/statisticsLab/).
